title: GENCODE category quality metric
description: Schema for reporting bulk RNA-seq pipeline GENCODE comprehensive unique category counts

IG_C_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
IG_C_gene.title: IgC gene

IG_D_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
IG_D_gene.title: IgD gene

IG_J_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
IG_J_gene.title: IgJ gene

IG_V_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
IG_V_gene.title: IgV gene

Mt_rRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
Mt_rRNA.title: Mt rRNA

Mt_tRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
Mt_tRNA.title: Mt tRNA

TEC.description: To be Experimentally Confirmed. This is used for non-spliced EST clusters that have polyA features. This category has been specifically created for the ENCODE project to highlight regions that could indicate the presence of protein coding genes that require experimental validation, either by 5' RACE or RT-PCR to extend the transcripts, or by confirming expression of the putatively-encoded peptide with specific antibodies.
TEC.title: TEC

TR_C_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
TR_C_gene.title: TRC gene

TR_D_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
TR_D_gene.title: TRD gene

TR_J_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
TR_J_gene.title: TRJ gene

TR_V_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
TR_V_gene.title: TRV gene

number_of_genes_detected.description: Number of genes detected at > 1 TPM
number_of_genes_detected.title: gene

lincRNA.description: Long, intervening noncoding (linc) RNA that can be found in evolutionarily conserved, intergenic regions.
lincRNA.title: lincRNA

macro_lncRNA.description: Unspliced lncRNA that is several kb in size.
macro_lncRNA.title: macro lncRNA

miRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
miRNA.title: miRNA

misc_RNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
misc_RNA.title: misc RNA

non_coding.description: Transcript which is known from the literature to not be protein coding.
non_coding.title: non coding

polymorphic_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene owing to a SNP/DIP but in other individuals/haplotypes/strains the gene is translated.
polymorphic_pseudogene.title: polymorphic pseudogene

processed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene that lack introns and is thought to arise from reverse transcription of mRNA followed by reinsertion of DNA into the genome.
processed_pseudogene.title: processed pseudogene

pseudogene.description: Have homology to proteins but generally suffer from a disrupted coding sequence and an active homologous gene can be found at another locus. Sometimes these entries have an intact coding sequence or an open but truncated ORF, in which case there is other evidence used (for example genomic polyA stretches at the 3' end) to classify them as a pseudogene. Can be further classified as one of the following.
pseudogene.title: pseudogene

rRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
rRNA.title: rRNA

ribozyme.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
ribozyme.title: ribozyme

sRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
sRNA.title: sRNA

scaRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
scaRNA.title: scaRNA

sense_intronic.description: Long non-coding transcript in introns of a coding gene that does not overlap any exons.
sense_intronic.title: sense intronic

sense_overlapping.description: Long non-coding transcript that contains a coding gene in its intron on the same strand.
sense_overlapping.title: sense overlapping

snRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
snRNA.title: snRNA

snoRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
snoRNA.title: snoRNA

transcribed_processed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene where protein homology or genomic structure indicates a pseudogene, but the presence of locus-specific transcripts indicates expression.
transcribed_processed_pseudogene.title: transcribed processed pseudogene

transcribed_unitary_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene where protein homology or genomic structure indicates a pseudogene, but the presence of locus-specific transcripts indicates expression.
transcribed_unitary_pseudogene.title: transcribed unitary pseudogene

transcribed_unprocessed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene where protein homology or genomic structure indicates a pseudogene, but the presence of locus-specific transcripts indicates expression.
transcribed_unprocessed_pseudogene.title: transcribed unprocessed pseudogene

translated_unprocessed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene that has mass spec data suggesting that it is also translated.
translated_unprocessed_pseudogene.title: translated unprocessed pseudogene

unitary_pseudogene.description: A species-specific unprocessed pseudogene without a parent gene, as it has an active orthologue in another species.
unitary_pseudogene.title: unitary pseudogene

unprocessed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene that can contain introns since produced by gene duplication.
unprocessed_pseudogene.title: unprocessed pseudogene

vaultRNA.description: Short non coding RNA gene that forms part of the vault ribonucleoprotein complex.
vaultRNA.title: vaultRNA
